content: There's also a Teku fork with Phase 1 implemented (https://github.com/txrx-research/teku/tree/phase1). The Ph1 state transition is actually automatically transpiled into Kotlin directly from the Phase 1 specification, I believe. <@425572898787426305> knows much more about this: he has been using it for his Phase 1.5 simulations and demonstrations.
